industry: Retail Apparel and Fashion and Retail Luxury Goods and Jewelry
description:
Dolce & Gabbana, a leader in the world of luxury fashion, has an exceptional career opportunity available at our Beverly Hills Rodeo Boutique. We are seeking a Stock Keeper to act as the point person for maintaining all the inbound/outbound merchandise, as well as the maintenance and organization of all back of house stock and supply areas.

Responsibilities

  • Management of stock to maximize productivity
  • Knowledge of all shipping and receiving procedures and paperwork distribution
  • Merchandise received directly from vendors
  • Inter-store transfers, RTVs and damages
  • Client purchases, consignments, charge sends to other locations
  • Maintain comprehensive logs for all incoming and outgoing shipments
  • Input and process all authorized merchandise into inventory through the Computer System
  • Maintains loss prevention standards through awareness and adherence to Store policies
  • Role in controlling shortage through inventory management
  • Proper ticketing and sensor standards

Qualifications

  • 2+ years of retail operations experience
  • Experience managing a luxury retail stock room
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Overall organization and attention to detail

Salary: $20/hr - $22/hr

Location: USA – Los Angeles– CA
